body:

### Steps to reproduce

Open a work codebase and select text to yank.
I cannot reproduce outside of this codebase unfortunately.

### Expected behavior

Not segfault

### Neovim version (nvim -v)

v0.10.0-dev+1427-gac353e87a

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

no

### Operating system/version

Feora 38

### Terminal name/version

kitty 0.29.2

### $TERM environment variable

xterm-256color

### Installation

https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/agriffis/neovim-nightly/

comment_data.body:
We don't support nightly distro builds. Please use the provided appimages or build from source yourself. (Or, better yet, stick with releases unless you want to help with Neovim development.)

If you can reproduce with either, we'll reopen.
If you can reproduce , please also provide a minimal(!) config, even if you can't share the files that lead to the crash.

labels.description: issue reporting a crash or segfault
labels.name: bug-crash

title: Segfault
